name: Man follows stars.
motif: A man tries to join a group of persons who are or become stars (usually the Pleiades) but suffers a reverse; or he pursues the stars to have sexual contact or to be reintegrated with members of his family.
[paste it here]: m50. Man follows stars. A man tries to join a group of persons who are or become stars (usually the Pleiades) but suffers a reverse; or he pursues the stars to have sexual contact or to be reintegrated with members of his family.
Mythemes:
•	Man tries to join/become stars.
	•	Man suffers reverse/pursues stars for sexual contact/reintegration.
